mapper.sql: id, stu_no AS stuNo, scheme_name AS schemeName, scheme_num AS schemeNum, school_code AS schoolCode, school_name AS schoolName, major_list AS majorList, scheme_change AS schemeChange, scheme_type AS schemeType,
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stu_scheme(stu_no, scheme_name, scheme_num, school_code, school_name, major_list, scheme_change, scheme_type) VALUES (#{stuScheme.stuNo},#{stuScheme.schemeName},#{stuScheme.schemeNum},#{stuScheme.schoolCode}, #{stuScheme.schoolName},#{stuScheme.majorList},#{stuScheme.schemeChange},#{stuScheme.schemeType})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM stu_scheme WHERE stu_no =#{stuNo} ORDER BY scheme_num ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE stu_scheme SET scheme_change = #{schemeChange} where id = #{id}
